item.title: 据称，KKR支持的Cengage正考虑在今年进行5亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由百仕通集团和KKR & Co.等机构支持的Cengage集团正考虑让这家全球教育科技公司首次公开募股，预计融资规模约为5亿美元。【原文：Cengage Group, which counts Apax Partners and KKR & Co. among its backers, is weighing an initial public offering of the global education technology company that could raise roughly $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，因特朗普对美联储的评论削弱降息预期
item.description: 美国国债价格下跌，交易员下调了对2026年美联储两次降息的预期。此前美国总统特朗普暗示，他将提名国家经济委员会主任凯文·哈塞特以外的人选接替美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔。【原文：Treasuries fell and traders trimmed their expectations for two US interest-rate cuts in 2026 after US President Donald Trump suggested he’d nominate someone other than National Economic Council director Kevin Hassett to succeed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 鲍曼呼吁美联储为就业市场持续疲软做好降息准备
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔·鲍曼表示，货币政策仍保持适度收紧，除非就业形势好转，否则官员们应准备进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman said monetary policy remains moderately restrictive and officials should be prepared to lower interest rates further unless the employment landscape improves.】

item.title: 马斯克炮轰瑞安航空老板，两位尖锐CEO的争斗不断升级
item.description: 一场原本相当无害的辩论，在两位直言不讳的企业领袖之间展开后，很快便升级为一场丑陋的争吵，双方互相辱骂，不留情面。【原文：It didn’t take long for a fairly innocuous debate between two outspoken corporate leaders to escalate into an ugly brawl, name-calling and all.】

item.title: 特朗普对提名哈塞特担任美联储主席一事表示犹豫
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普对提名凯文·哈塞特担任美联储主席一事态度犹豫，这使得他寻找下一任央行行长的计划蒙上更多疑云。【原文：President Donald Trump expressed reluctance toward nominating Kevin Hassett as Federal Reserve chair, casting further doubt over his search for the next head of the central bank.】

item.title: 商品交易商Mercuria公司对13亿美元利润仅缴纳0.08%的税款
item.description: 据彭博新闻社获得的财务报表显示，在截至9月的12个月里，墨丘利能源集团有限公司对超过10亿美元的利润几乎未缴纳任何税款。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. paid almost no tax on profits of more than $1 billion in the 12 months through September, according to a copy of its accounts seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 私人飞机热潮推动机库建造商Sky Harbour进军市政市场
item.description: 天港集团公司是一家为超级富豪建造专属机库、停放私人飞机的企业，该公司正转向免税市政债券市场筹集1亿美元资金，以支持其业务扩张计划。【原文：Sky Harbour Group Corp., a builder of exclusive hangars where the ultra-wealthy park their private aircraft, is turning to the tax-exempt municipal bond market to borrow $100 million as it seeks to expand.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰将收购基金投资者欲套现的股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，蓝鸮资本公司计划开始从寻求套现的投资者手中收购私募资产基金的二手份额，借此把握此类交易激增的机遇。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. plans to start buying secondhand stakes in private-asset funds from investors looking to cash out, taking advantage of a boom in such transactions, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心指数五个月来首次下滑
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商信心指数1月意外下滑，因高昂的销售激励措施抵消了近期抵押贷款利率下降及总统住房提案带来的提振效应。【原文：Confidence among US homebuilders unexpectedly fell in January, as costly sales incentives outweighed a recent boost from lower mortgage rates and the president’s housing proposals.】

item.title: 标普500指数延续涨势，科技巨头股受人工智能交易推动走高
item.description: 美国股市周五延续涨势，科技股的狂热行情已持续至第二日。【原文：US stocks extended gains on Friday as the euphoria over technology stocks continued for a second day.】

item.title: 九一集团认为非洲债券市场是追逐收益者的丰厚猎场
item.description: Ninety One Plc认为，非洲广阔的债券市场——这个曾因经济风险而遭投资者回避的新兴市场角落——正为寻求更高回报的投资者提供机遇。【原文：Ninety One Plc sees Africa’s broad bond market, a corner of emerging markets once shunned because of its economic risks, as an opportunity for investors looking for bigger returns.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔时隔七年重返全球债务市场
item.description: 厄瓜多尔正准备重返国际债务市场，这是该国自2019年以来首次回归。【原文：Ecuador is readying its return to international debt markets for the first time since 2019.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利顶级基金避开巴西、哥伦比亚，因选举忧虑
item.description: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司正回避巴西和哥伦比亚的本地债务，因预算缺口不断扩大，加剧了对两国今年总统大选前局势的担忧。【原文：Morgan Stanley Investment Management is shunning local debt from Brazil and Colombia as ballooning budget gaps add to concerns ahead of this year’s presidential elections in the two nations.】

item.title: ClickHouse在人工智能数据库竞赛中斩获150亿美元估值
item.description:
Dragoneer正为这家初创企业领投一轮4亿美元的融资。

【原文：

Dragoneer is leading a $400 million funding round for the startup.

】

item.title: 意大利央行估计第四季度国内生产总值小幅上升
item.description: 意大利央行表示，尽管面临全球逆风，欧元区第三大经济体在第四季度可能仍"保持温和扩张"。【原文：The Bank of Italy said the euro zone’s third-biggest economy probably “continued to expand moderately” in the fourth quarter despite global headwinds.】

item.title: DoorDash首席营收官李·布朗短暂任职后离职
item.description: DoorDash公司首席营收官李·布朗在任职不到六个月后即将离职，以寻求新的发展机遇。【原文：DoorDash Inc. Chief Revenue Officer Lee Brown is departing the delivery app company after less than six months to pursue a new opportunity.】

item.title: 信实工业因零售和石化业务疲软未达盈利预期
item.description: 信实工业有限公司公布的季度利润低于预期，原因是石化和零售业务增长乏力，抵消了其炼油和电信部门的强劲表现。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. reported a lower-than-expected quarterly profit as sluggish growth in the petrochemical and retail businesses offset a strong showing in its refining and telecom units.】

item.title: 嘉能可与阿曼达成钢铁原料承购协议
item.description: 嘉能可公司已同意每年从拟建于阿曼的工厂采购至少50万吨热压铁饼，确保自2030年起获得这种低碳炼钢原料的稳定供应。【原文：Glencore Plc has agreed to buy at least 500,000 tons a year of hot briquetted iron from a planned Oman-based plant, securing supply of the low-carbon steelmaking input from 2030.】

item.title: 摩根大通超越Dimensional，成为全球最大主动型ETF公司
item.description: 摩根资产管理公司再创一项新纪录：该公司现已成为全球最大的主动管理型交易所交易基金发行机构。【原文：JPMorgan Asset Management has a new superlative: The firm now hails as the world’s largest issuer of actively managed exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 波罗的海三国联合推动争取欧洲央行副行长职位
item.description: 欧元区三个波罗的海成员国启动协调行动，确保其候选人之一当选欧洲中央银行下一任副行长。【原文：The euro area’s three Baltic members launched a coordinated effort to ensure one of their candidates becomes the next vice president of the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 贝宁计划今年首次发行非洲美元债券，目标规模达10亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝宁计划通过发行美元计价的伊斯兰债券及其他贷款证券筹集高达10亿美元资金，这将是今年非洲首个主权债务发行项目。【原文：Benin is set to raise as much as $1 billion from a sale of dollar-denominated sukuk bonds and other loan securities in what would be the first African sovereign-debt offering this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 佩特罗创纪录的23%工资涨幅引发哥伦比亚经济连锁反应
item.description: 哥伦比亚政府正试图对某些商品价格实施上限管控，以应对其创纪录的最低工资上调所引发的一系列意外后果。【原文：Colombia’s government is trying to cap some prices as it grapples with a series of unintended consequences from its record minimum wage hike.】

item.title: 埃弗科报告：私募二级市场交易额飙升至创纪录的2260亿美元
item.description: 埃弗科公司在一份报告中指出，去年私有资产的二级交易量激增41%，达到创纪录的2260亿美元，投资者正以更具创造性的方式利用该市场获取流动性。【原文：Secondary deal volume for private assets surged 41% to a record $226 billion last year, Evercore Inc. said in a report, as investors got more creative about tapping that market for liquidity.】

item.title: 所罗门合伙公司任命大卫·希夫曼领导投资银行业务
item.description: 由法国兴业银行集团支持的精品投行所罗门合伙公司（Solomon Partners）任命大卫·A·希夫曼（David A. Shiffman）为投资银行部主管。随着这家咨询公司扩大高级管理团队，该职位为新设立的岗位。【原文：Solomon Partners, the boutique investment bank backed by Natixis SA, has appointed David A. Shiffman as head of investment banking, a newly created role as the advisory firm expands its senior leadership.】

item.title: Pagaya发售由个人贷款支持的特殊债券
item.description: 金融科技公司Pagaya Technologies Ltd.通过发行由个人贷款担保的债券，在所谓混合私募-公募交易中筹集了3.5亿美元，这是该公司首次采用此类担保方式融资。【原文：Fintech firm Pagaya Technologies Ltd. raised $350 million through a bond backed by personal loans in a so-called hybrid private-public transaction, the first for the company using such collateral.】

item.title: 石油探矿者哈姆暂停巴肯地区的钻探作业
item.description: 对全球原油过剩的担忧已对油价构成压力，拖累了利润。【原文：Concerns over a global crude glut have pressured prices, weighing on profits.】

item.title: 亿万富豪皮尼亚塔罗旗下ION部门高管离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，微软公司前高管已离开意大利信用信息公司Cerved集团。该公司隶属于亿万富翁安德烈亚·皮尼亚塔罗旗下的ION集团。【原文：A former Microsoft Corp. executive has left Cerved Group, the Italian credit-information company that is part of billionaire Andrea Pignataro’s ION Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非兰特汇率有望创下2002年以来最长连涨纪录
item.description: 南非兰特正延续着二十多年来罕见的周度连涨势头，贵金属价格走高与经济环境改善共同推动了其升值。【原文：South Africa’s rand is on a weekly winning run not seen in more than two decades as elevated precious-metal prices and an improving economic backdrop drive gains.】

item.title: 莫迪及其盟友在孟买选举中横扫全场，目标是基础设施大改造
item.description: 莫迪总理领导的政党首次在孟买市政选举中取得压倒性胜利，终结了地方政党数十年的统治，彰显了他在印度金融中心城市居民中的高人气。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party swept the local municipality polls in Mumbai for the first time, ending decades of control by regional parties and underscoring his popularity among the urban population in India’s financial capital.】

item.title: 哈罗德·哈姆因油价下跌暂停巴肯页岩区钻探
item.description: 哈罗德·哈姆——这位助推美国页岩油革命的亿万富翁石油探勘者表示，由于原油价格低迷，他即将首次在数十年来关闭北达科他州巴肯地区的钻井作业。【原文：Harold Hamm, the billionaire wildcatter who helped kick off the US shale oil revolution, said he’s about to shut down drilling in North Dakota’s Bakken for the first time in decades because of low crude prices.】
